attributes.action: Stop pubs in residential areas having late night disruptive music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sick of pubs in residential areas having discos, kareokes etc until 1pm or later. Not only is the noice audiable in local properties, the people leaving the pubs late at night are inconsiderate to the residents surrounding the premises.  Stop the music by 11pm.  This should encourage people to move into the town centres instead causing less problems in residential areas.
